DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy study drug compare placebo treatment cognitive impairment men schizophrenia .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Cognitive Impairment Men With Schizophrenia ( MK5757-005 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Patient male 21 55 year age Duration illness must longer 1 year Patient 's current antipsychotic medication regimen must stable Patient negative select drug abuse Screening Must stable living arrangement least 3 month prior screen ( homeless shelter ) Patient mental retardation Undergone Electroconvulsive Therapy ( ECT ) treatment within 6 month prior screen Has suicidal attempt ideation within last 12 month Patient history alcohol/drug dependence within 1 year alcohol/drug abuse within 12 month start study
